lessons.content: In this lesson, we'll explore what programming is and why it's important in today's digital world. We'll cover basic concepts and set up our development environment.
lessons.title: Getting Started with Programming

lessons.content: Learn about variables, constants, and different data types available in programming languages. We'll practice declaring and using variables in practical examples.
lessons.title: Variables and Data Types

lessons.content: Learn the foundation of web development with HTML. We'll cover tags, elements, attributes, and how to structure a basic web page.
lessons.title: HTML Basics

lessons.content: Discover how to make your web pages visually appealing with CSS. Topics include selectors, properties, layouts, and responsive design principles.
lessons.title: CSS Styling

lessons.content: An overview of differential and integral calculus. We'll start with limits and derivatives, building the foundation for more advanced topics.
lessons.title: Calculus Introduction

lessons.content: Deep dive into derivatives, rules of differentiation, and practical applications in physics, economics, and engineering problems.
lessons.title: Derivatives and Applications

lessons.content: Learn various integration methods including substitution, integration by parts, and partial fractions. Practice with real-world problems.
lessons.title: Integration Techniques

lessons.content: Explore how integration is used to calculate areas, volumes, and solve differential equations. Final project included.
lessons.title: Applications of Integration

lessons.content: Learn the basics of data analysis and how to work with datasets using Python and pandas.
lessons.title: Introduction to Data Analysis

lessons.content: Explore different data visualization techniques and tools to present data effectively.
lessons.title: Data Visualization

lessons.content: Get started with React Native and learn how to build cross-platform mobile applications.
lessons.title: Introduction to React Native

lessons.content: Learn about React Native components and how to implement navigation between screens.
lessons.title: UI Components and Navigation

lessons.content: Connect your mobile app to backend services and handle API requests and responses.
lessons.title: Working with APIs
